name: Block All Puzzle
description:
Classic and pleasurable puzzle game for all ages!
Classic game, very interesting design.

How to play?
Click to move them and place them in the correct position.
Fill blocks in a vertical or horizontal line to clear them.
You just need to click the square to move your finger to achieve the goal and eliminate the square.
If you unable to fill lines complete, the Blocks will stack up.
When there is no new tile space, the game ends.
So don’t forget to reserve space to fill the square!

Block All Puzzle Features:
-Fun to use your unlimited imaginations .
-Easy to pick up, but hard and challenging to master.
-Try to create solid lines vertically or horizontally on the grid.
-Endless, relaxed gameplay, perfect time killer.

Once you start the game, you cannot stop the game! Not only trains your brain, but also allows you to enjoy the fun during the game!
It will definitely bring you leisure and good time to exercise your brain! Suitable for games and entertainment games for all ages. Easily learn and master the fun of gameplay.

Please enjoy the classic "Block all puzzle" and you will be attracted!
